amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part A of House Report 115-711 to encourage the Secretary to consider reasonable alternative agreements between state or local entities, private partners, and the U.S. Army Corps of Engineering to dispose of dredged material.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lewis (MN) amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Lewis (MN).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lewis (MN) amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
